biotools.summary: IT is an R package to find enriched regions in trancription factor ChIP-seq data. The algorithm uses model-free statistics to identify peak-like distributions of TF ChIP sequencing reads, taking advantage of an improved peak definition in combination with known profile characteristics.

bioschemas.name: triform
